name: Scroller
description: A jQuery plugin for replacing default browser scrollbars.

methods.name: scroll
methods.description: Scrolls instance of plugin to element or position

params.name: pos
params.description: Target element selector or static position

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets layout on instance of plugin

demo_content:
Basic

The most basic method is simply applying the scroller plugin:

$(".scrollbar").scroller();
Demo

Advanced

Customize a specific Scroller instance:

$(".scrollbar").scroller({
	customClass: "advanced",
	trackMargin: 15,
	handleSize: 40
});
Demo

Horizontal

Add a horizontal scrollbar to a content element:

$(".scrollbar").scroller({
	horizontal: true
});
Demo

Reset

After appending content, you will need to call the reset method on the target element:

$(".scrollbar").scroller("reset");
Demo
Append Content

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.


Scroll

Manually scroll an instance to a specific pixel value or selector:

$(".scrollbar").scroller("scroll", [value | selector]);
Demo
Scroll to "0px" Scroll to "200px" Scroll to "#scroll_target" Animate scroll to "300px" in 500ms
